SEARCH
Package controllers

Class MainMenuConditionController

java.lang.Object
controllers.MainMenuConditionController
public class MainMenuConditionController extends Object
This class is responsible for managing pagination and the state of the application's main menu, ensuring that values are updated and checking if you can navigate through the pages.
